chartbeat.title: NCAAM College Basketball Scores - NCAAM Scoreboard - ESPN

content.description: Real-time NCAAM College Basketball scores on ESPN
content.keywords: NCAAM Scores, NCAAM scoreboard, College Basketball Scores, College Basketball scoreboard

headlines.description: Chris Clarke tipped in a missed shot with 4 seconds remaining Monday night, and Virginia Tech stunned No. 5 Duke 64-63.
headlines.shortLinkText: Clarke's tip-in helps Hokies stun No. 5 Duke, 64-63

headlines.description: Svi Mykhailiuk had 17 points, Devonte Graham added 10 and 11 assists and No. 6 Kansas beat Texas 80-70 Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Seniors propel No. 6 Kansas to 80-70 win over Texas

video.headline: Kansas tops Texas on senior night

headlines.description: Jevon Carter scored 21 points and Daxter Miles Jr. added 18 in their final home game, and No. 20 West Virginia rode a hot start to an 84-74 victory over No. 12 Texas Tech on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Carter, Miles help No. 20 WVU beat No. 12 Texas Tech 84-74

video.headline: West Virginia handles Texas Tech on senior night

headlines.description: Andrew Rowsey scored nine of his 28 points in overtime, Sam Hauser also finished with 28 points and Marquette hit 18 3-pointers in a 90-86 victory over Georgetown on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Rowsey scores Marquette's final 9 in OT, downs Georgetown

headlines.description: Alex Long and Preston Bungei each had a double-double on Monday night to help Norfolk State beat Howard 79-74 for its fifth win in a row and ninth in the last 10 games.
headlines.shortLinkText: Long, Bungei have double-doubles as Norfolk St. beats Howard

headlines.description: Stuckey Mosley scored 29 points with six 3-pointers and five assists and James Madison beat Elon 90-84 on Monday night in the regular-season finale for both teams.
headlines.shortLinkText: Mosely scores 29, James Madison beats Elon 90-84

headlines.description: Zach Johnson and Christian Terrell combined to make 8 of 10 from 3-point range and score 44 points to help Florida Gulf Coast beat South Carolina Upstate 96-76 on Monday night in the first round of the ASUN Tournament.
headlines.shortLinkText: Johnson, Terrell help FGCU beat USC Upstate in A-Sun tourney

headlines.description: Jace Hogan scored a career-best 39 points, the most by a Jacksonville player in an Atlantic Sun Tournament game, and the Dolphins knocked off Kennesaw State 87-68 on Monday night in the opening round.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jacksonville beats Kennesaw State 87-68 in ASUN tournament

headlines.description: Davaris McGowens scored 23 points and grabbed 11 rebounds, Aaren Edmead added 19 points, and North Carolina A&T beat Bethune-Cookman 86-80 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: NC A&T beats Bethune-Cookman 86-80 behind McGowens

headlines.description: Tyler Jones scored 21 points and grabbed 13 rebounds and Maryland-Eastern Shore beat Delaware State 59-47 on Monday night to end a five-game skid and sweep the season series.
headlines.shortLinkText: Maryland-Eastern Shore downs Delaware State 59-47

headlines.description: Garrett Sam finished with career-high 28 points and North Florida held on for an 80-76 win over NJIT in the first round of the ASUN Tournament on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Sams scores 28, North Florida beats NJIT in ASUN tourney

headlines.description: Tiwian Kendley scored 27 points and Phillip Carr had his 14th double-double of the season to help Morgan State cruise to a 69-56 win over Coppin State on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Kendley scores 27, Morgan St. beats Coppin St. 69-56

headlines.description: Elijah Mayes scored a career-high 25 points, Desmond Williams added 24 points and a career-high 15 rebounds and Florida A&M beat South Carolina State 76-74 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Mayes, Williams help Florida A&M beat South Carolina State

headlines.description: Alante Fenner scored 25 points with three 3-pointers, Javaris Jenkins added 23 points with four 3s, and Savannah State beat North Carolina Central 85-75 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Fenner, Jenkins combine for 48 pts in Savannah State win

headlines.description: Garrison Mathews scored 29 points with five 3-pointers for his 19th 20-plus game of the season and Lipscomb beat Stetson 89-73 on Monday night to advance to its fourth straight Atlantic Sun Tournament semifinal game.
headlines.shortLinkText: Lipscomb advances to 4th straight ASUN semi, beats Stetson

headlines.description: Dennis Jones had 14 points and 10 assists, Gary Blackston also scored 14, and Prairie View A&M never trailed in defeating Alabama A&M 71-58 on Monday night to sweep the season series.
headlines.shortLinkText: Prairie View A&M sweeps Alabama A&M with 71-58 win

headlines.description: Jordan Evans scored 29 points and grabbed nine rebounds, Dante Scott had 15 points and 13 boards and Mississippi Valley State beat Grambling State 79-74 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: MVSU beats Grambling State 79-74

headlines.description: Paris Collins had 17 points and eight rebounds, Lemmie Howard added 11 points and nine boards and Jackson State beat Arkansas-Pine Bluff 51-48 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jackson State beats Arkansas-Pine Bluff 51-48

venue.fullName: Lee E. Williams Athletic and Assembly Center

headlines.description: Bryson Williams scored 15 points with eight rebounds, Ray Bowles added 11 points, and Fresno State beat Air Force 54-48 on Monday night to clinch a first-round bye in the Mountain West Conference Tournament for the fourth straight season.
headlines.shortLinkText: Fresno State gets tourney bye with 54-48 win over Air Force

headlines.description: Derrick Bruce and Demontrae Jefferson combined to make 12 of Texas Southern's 13 3-pointers and scored 71 points to help the Tigers beat Alabama State 95-77 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bruce, Jefferson combine for 71 points in Texas Southern win

nowFeed.headline: This is going to be a rough wait until Selection Sunday for Saint Mary's. Their at-large resume is basically one win at Gonzaga, a gaudy record (including a great record away from home) and very solid predictive/quality metrics.
nowFeed.story: This is going to be a rough wait until Selection Sunday for Saint Mary's. Their at-large resume is basically one win at Gonzaga, a gaudy record (including a great record away from home) and very solid predictive/quality metrics.

nowFeed.headline:
Arkansas senior Dustin Thomas has been dismissed from the team, effective immediately, for a violation of team rules. 

Has played at least 18 minutes in 12 of the Razorbacks' last 15 games.
nowFeed.story:
Arkansas senior Dustin Thomas has been dismissed from the team, effective immediately, for a violation of team rules. 

Has played at least 18 minutes in 12 of the Razorbacks' last 15 games.

nowFeed.headline: After a couple of upsets en route to its Big Ten title, Michigan has jumped up to 14th in BPI's latest rankings. Florida also a big mover in the last week.
nowFeed.story: After a couple of upsets en route to its Big Ten title, Michigan has jumped up to 14th in BPI's latest rankings. Florida also a big mover in the last week.

nowFeed.headline: John Beilein said several teams that made deep March runs have had this type of long layoff in the past  and winning a title game at Madison Square Garden balances it out. "To play in front of that crowd, that's a once in a lifetime experience. It's worth the wait."
nowFeed.story: John Beilein said several teams that made deep March runs have had this type of long layoff in the past  and winning a title game at Madison Square Garden balances it out. "To play in front of that crowd, that's a once in a lifetime experience. It's worth the wait."

nowFeed.headline: There might not be a hotter team nationally right now than Michigan. Nine straight wins for the Wolverines, back-to-back Big Ten tournament titles.
nowFeed.story: There might not be a hotter team nationally right now than Michigan. Nine straight wins for the Wolverines, back-to-back Big Ten tournament titles.

nowFeed.headline: Nojel Eastern has had some moments this week for Purdue. Has been very good defensively, his size causing some problems for Tony Carr yesterday, being used on Zavier Simpson today. Also has six points today.
nowFeed.story: Nojel Eastern has had some moments this week for Purdue. Has been very good defensively, his size causing some problems for Tony Carr yesterday, being used on Zavier Simpson today. Also has six points today.

nowFeed.headline:
Michigan's Jon Teske has 12 points in 10 minutes so far today. 

In Michigan's last 11 games, Jon Teske had scored a combined 19 points.
nowFeed.story:

nowFeed.headline: Battle of the big men so far here at Madison Square Garden. Isaac Haas has all seven points for Purdue; Moe Wagner and Jon Teske combining for all nine for Michigan.
nowFeed.story: Battle of the big men so far here at Madison Square Garden. Isaac Haas has all seven points for Purdue; Moe Wagner and Jon Teske combining for all nine for Michigan.

nowFeed.headline: Radford was picked seventh in the Big South preseason polls. They finished as the two seed. Now they are going dancing! Radford Big South Champions.
nowFeed.story: Radford was picked seventh in the Big South preseason polls. They finished as the two seed. Now they are going dancing! Radford Big South Champions.

nowFeed.headline: At one point this season Arizona State was ranked No. 3 in the AP poll. Now, after losing to Stanford yesterday, the Sun Devils have just a 23% chance to reach the NCAA tournament, per BPI.
nowFeed.story: At one point this season Arizona State was ranked No. 3 in the AP poll. Now, after losing to Stanford yesterday, the Sun Devils have just a 23% chance to reach the NCAA tournament, per BPI.

nowFeed.headline: Arizona players just ran through the crowd after the win at Cal. Fans loved it here in Tucson on Senior Night.
nowFeed.story: Arizona players just ran through the crowd after the win at Cal. Fans loved it here in Tucson on Senior Night.

nowFeed.headline:
I followed Grayson Allen closely since his high school days. A fierce  competitor who gave it his all. He never had one issue on or off the court. I called Duke's game last year when Grayson Allen had his tripping incident. Tonight on senior night in a win over North Carolina I loved listening to Maria Taylor's post-game interview with Allen. 
What does Duke mean to you? 
" It means everything to me, it's my love and my passion. " Allen said. 
I call that growing up.
nowFeed.story:
I followed Grayson Allen closely since his high school days. A fierce  competitor who gave it his all. He never had one issue on or off the court. I called Duke's game last year when Grayson Allen had his tripping incident. Tonight on senior night in a win over North Carolina I loved listening to Maria Taylor's post-game interview with Allen. 
What does Duke mean to you? 
" It means everything to me, it's my love and my passion. " Allen said. 
I call that growing up.

nowFeed.headline: Wildcats Head Coach Sean Miller called Deandre Ayton a "once in a generation talent."  Ayton finished with 26 points and 20 rebounds in 35 minutes of play against Cal.

nowFeed.headline: When asked to put into words the week that was, Arizona Head Coach Sean Miller used "devastating" and "remarkable."  U of A clinched the PAC-12 regular season title with a 66-54 victory over California.
nowFeed.story: When asked to put into words the week that was, Arizona Head Coach Sean Miller used "devastating" and "remarkable."  U of A clinched the PAC-12 regular season title with a 66-54 victory over California.

nowFeed.headline: Duke trails by 3, but it's been a night of missed opportunities - and shots - for the Blue Devils. They are 1-8 from behind the arc, including this shot, which feel about six inches short.
